Package io.github.jonestimd.swing.window

This package contains classes for managing application windows.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PanelFactory<T extends ApplicationWindowEvent<?>>  
    WindowEventListener<E extends WindowInfo>  
    WindowInfo
    This interface provides information about an application window and is typically implemented by an enum.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationWindowEvent<E extends WindowInfo>  
    ConfirmCloseAdapter
    This class handles window closing events.
    FrameAction<E extends WindowInfo>  
    FrameManager<Key extends WindowInfo>
    Manages an application's windows.
    StatusFrame
    This class extends JFrame to disable user input and provide progress messages during long running processes.
    WindowEventPublisher<E extends WindowInfo>
    Publishes ApplicationWindowEvents to registered WindowEventListeners.

Package io.github.jonestimd.swing.window Description

This package contains classes for managing application windows. The steps for using the classes are
  • Create a WindowEventPublisher
  • Create a FrameManager and register it with the event publisher
  • Add FrameActions to window menus/toolbars during content panel creation
  • Use the FrameManager to display the first window
